item.description: Good choice Mike, hope you'll enjoy your new gear.

item.title: By: Mike Nelson
item.dc:creator: Mike Nelson
item.description:
Hey, good review. I was going to buy the GP Pro's as my leathers and boots are Alpinestars, but i think you've won me over. Thanks.
Mike
item.content:encoded:
Hey, good review. I was going to buy the GP Pro’s as my leathers and boots are Alpinestars, but i think you’ve won me over. Thanks.

Mike
